item.title: George Ezra - Green Green Grass
item.description:
Well she moves
like lightning
And she counts
to three
And she turns out
all the lights
And says
she’s coming for me
Now put your hands up
this is a heist
And there’s no one
in here living
Gonna make it out
alive
Loaded up when
the sun comes down
Getaway car
for two young lovers
Me and the girl
straight out of town
Over the hills
and undercover
Undercover undercover
she said

blue blue sky

throw a party
On the day
that I die
